Headline: Djokovic wins 19th Grand Slam at the French Open, Latest Tennis News - The New Paper
Text: Novak Djokovic clinched his 19th Grand Slam title this morning (Singapore time) after a comeback victory over Stefanos Tsitsipas in the French Open final.The world No. 1 defeated the Greek 6-7(6/8), 2-6, 6-3, 6-2, 6-4 to move just one Slam title behind rivals Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal.Meanwhile, Barbora Krejcikova teamed up with fellow Czech Katerina Siniakova to defeat Bethanie Mattek-Sands and Iga Swiatek 6-4, 6-2 for the women's doubles title, a day after winning the singles crown. - AFPGet The New Paper on your phone with the free TNP app. Download from the Apple App StoreÂ or Google Play Store now
